EmailTemplate.description: Welcome Letter from Partner Service Representative to Partner
EmailTemplate.name: Introduction to SunPower
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to SunPower
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}:
Please allow me introduce myself, my name is <name of PSR> and I am your Partner Support Representative with SunPower. <name of PSR #2> has also been assigned to your account and we work closely with your Regional Sales Manager, <name of regional sales manager>. We will be able to assist you with all your SunPower needs. When calling 1-800-SUNPOWER, I can be reached at extension <PSR extension> and <name of PSR #2> can be reached at extension <PSR 2 extension>.
Please find attached a document that details our banking information and payment instructions.
On behalf of the team, I would like to welcome you to the SunPower's Dealer Network. We look forward to a fruitful and harmonious partnership with you.
